snippet: An antigovernment monitoring group that is one of the few organizations still attempting to keep an exact count put the total number of victims at about 162,000.
abstract: Antigovernment monitoring group Syrian Observatory for Human Rights says death toll in three-year Syrian conflict has risen to about 162,000, increase of more than 10,000 in less than two months.
lead_paragraph: An antigovernment monitoring group that is one of the few organizations still attempting to keep an exact count put the total number of victims at about 162,000.

headline.main: Syria Death Toll Reported to Rise By 10,000 in Less Than 2 Months
headline.print_headline: Syria Death Toll Reported to Rise by 10,000 in Less Than 2 Months

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
